website_summaries.verdict: For beginning and casual skaters, these attractive and comfortable skates fit the bill, but they won't hold up to more advanced skating.
pros: Skate size corresponds to industry shoe sizes
Fits beginners comfortably, with cozy fleece lining
Blades hold their edge well for more than one skate session
cons: Laces are too short to properly lace up the boot
Blades must be sharpened prior to first use
Adult sizes run a bit large
Not good for more advanced skaters

customer_reviews.title: I am so disappointed in the quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my daughter only 3 months ago and she just called me from the skating rink to let me now the boot of the skate pulled of the soles of the skate. I am so disappointed in the quality. The insides were already getting holes in them and now today, this happens. They look like nice skates but they don't hold up well. I would definitely not recommend these skates. I feel like I flushed $80 down the drain. Hopefully the company will help me out. Have a nice day.
customer_reviews.author: Deanne

customer_reviews.title: Best Skates //
customer_reviews.text: Lovely pair of skates! I recently took up figure skating as a hobby and decided to ditch the rentals and get my own and these were the ones i chose. Very beautiful and high quality, not cheaply made. The fleece lining makes these very warm and comfortable to wear. Even though they are white they don't get dirtied or banged up easily. Love xx
customer_reviews.author: McKenna Kaelin

customer_reviews.title: A Comfortable skate!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are very comfortable and fit well. I am a women's size 5 shoe size and got the size 4 in these and they fit perfectly. I have a very narrow foot though so if you have a wider foot I would go with your regular shoe size in these. Those of you that said these run 2 sizes small are not correct. The reason your child who wears size 3 shoe would need a 5 in these is because womens size 5 is a kids size 3! These are womens sizes not kids so you have to convert the kids size to womens. A great skate for a casual skater.
customer_reviews.author: music mom

customer_reviews.title: These are very good quality skates for the price
customer_reviews.text: These are very good quality skates for the price. They have extra padding around the ankle which is nice for the most part, but it does make it so that you have to buy a couple of sizes up unless your child has super skinny ankles. My daughter is 5 years old, 47" tall, 50lbs and normally wears a size 12 shoe. I initially purchased a size 13, but had to return it to buy a size 2. The size 2 fits perfect around the ankle and has about 1.5 cm of extra toe space. She couldn't even get her foot into the size 13's due to the narrow ankle area.
customer_reviews.author: Caren Smith

customer_reviews.title: Good Beginner Skate
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Comfortable beginner figure skate. The fur is soft and cozy, and the blades arrive with a nice edge. They are sharp enough to skate on immediately. This is a very good first skate for someone who wants to learn to figure skate.
customer_reviews.author: Korr

customer_reviews.title: Both Soft AND Supportive
customer_reviews.text: Perfect!! So much nicer than the beat-up rentals. I got the fleece lining, and I love these: lots of support from the nice high tops, but the fleece keeps the skate from grinding on my ankle bone or digging into my legs at the top. I usually wear a size 8 1/2 to 9 shoe. The size 8 skates are perfect. I did have them sharpened at the rink- the edges were okay, but there wasn’t much of a “channel” down the middle. My son is in skating lessons, so we’re at the rink all the time. I’m not a figure skater, just a hobbyist.
customer_reviews.author: DrkEyedCajn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing prduct
customer_reviews.text: I love these skates! If you are interested in ice skating, then I 100% recommend these. My daughter has recently worn these, and she can do all sorts of spins in them.They come very sharp and they are very comfortable,and the inside is very soft. Absolutely no blisters.They have very good ankle support and can be worn with thick or thin socks without a problem. My only gripe about these skates is that the laces are not high in quality,so I recommend getting better laces. Other than that, the skates are amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey L. Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Lacing Hooks are defective or poorly made
customer_reviews.text: These skates are comfortable (according to my 7.5 year old granddaughter), and very attractive. At least they were until the lacing hooks started to break off. The first hook broke off after 3-4 times of skating. Mind you they are tied by a 7 year old then checked for tightness by a paid and professional skating instructor. The second hook that broke off completely, broke off after the 5th use! So we have had these skates for less than a month and have had to have them repaired TWICE!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievably comfy skates!
customer_reviews.text: We actually received the pink instead of the fleece, but my daughter tried them on and was amazed at how comfortable they were and decided to keep them. She tested them on the ice today and absolutely loved them. On a side note I had contacted Skate Guru about the mistake and they responded quickly with a solution. Thanks for such excellent customer service but we are totally keeping the pink ones!
customer_reviews.author: c smith

customer_reviews.title: Good if you want to skate for fun, not for lessons.
customer_reviews.text: These ice skates were great in comfort and style. Unfortunately my daughter's ice skating instructer stated the skates were too lengthy (height) and will not allow my daughter to properly bend her legs to perform the techniques in the pre-alpha class. I had to but her new ones.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for adult beginner lessons
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an 8 in running shoes, but bought a 7 skate and they fit perfectly. I have had my skates for over a year now and they still look new. I've been taking lessons with them and skate several times a week. I have gone from level 1-6 with on problems or complaints. You will need to sharpen them before you skate, but most rinks can do that for you for around $10-$15.
customer_reviews.author: ANDREA MCKINNEY

customer_reviews.title: Classic figure skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my wife who use to skate more often earlier in her life. She liked them very much saying they kept her stabile while skating. Only complaint was the leather boot aggravated her ankle a bit. I think once she has them broken in everything should be fine. As for the blade, it was well sharpened and she had no problems at all with them. Overall a very good skate!
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has wide feet, so the ice skates that we rent pinched and were painful. She really likes these skates. She says they are very comfortable and look pretty too. Thrilled with this purchase. The laces (90") are a tad short, because of her wide feet, so we are buying longer laces.
customer_reviews.author: Military Brat

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and value for money
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of skates ( always used rental ones before ) . They are super comfortable, I was worried about sizing as sometimes with sportsware for feet I’m an 8 , but for casual a dress shoes always wear a 7 ... got a 7 and it’s perfect also allowing for thicker winter socks . So pleased I’m not using rentals anymore should have done this ages ago , also bought my 2 daughters the kids ones and equally happy with them ! Just need to get the hubby some now .
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette  clarke

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: The skates must be sharpened prior to use. They are very comfortable and the boot provides great ankle support with out digging in. My daughter has the purple lining and it isn't as padded as my skates that are lined in white fleece. If you have narrow feet the laces that comes with the skates are fine but a wider foot may need longer laces.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable skates for a beginner, good fit for a wider foot.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable skates for a beginner. Laces had to be replaced, they were too short for the boots to lace up properly. I wear a size 39 in street shoes, wider width (B - C typically), and Jackson Ultima Glacier GS 180 size 8 fits comfortably large, with a thin sports sock (the socks are thicker than pantihose-style socks).
customer_reviews.author: janya

customer_reviews.title: beginner skates //
customer_reviews.text: Great for occasional skating and level 1-3 skating but, as you start to get more advanced, it starts to get somewhat painful due to the lack of ankle support and how stiff the boot is. These skates worked well for me in my beginner levels of figure skating and were much better than the rentals! Personally, I'd only recommend these skates if they were being used for beginner skating or just skating around the rink with friends
customer_reviews.author: Vutorious

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Skates
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful upon arrival. Perfect fit. I wear a women's size 7.5-8 and I ordered a 7! If you have a wide foot, definitely order up a size though. I have VERY narrow feet and they are snug in width! Several other reviews said the laces were too short- mine were just perfect; not to long, not too short. Dull blades upon arrival! (The blade gaurds and soakers are not included- they are just on the skates in my picture)
customer_reviews.author: Carma Duffy

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my daughter who has been skating for a few years, and she loves them. They're tight where they should be and flexible where they should be. She was also really excited to have the purple lining.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Skate for Beginner and Beyond
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old daughter outgrew her last pair of skates , and picked out the Jackson fleece-lined soft skate. She just wore them last weekend, and said they were warm, comfortable, and didn’t rub the top of her ankle sore as her previous skates did. She just started doing spins, and these skates performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality is amazing! Keeps my daughter’s feet comfy and warm. The lining is so soft, my girl loves it! I did not have to sharpen it. Her coach said it is okay to be used as it is especially because she is a beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyoftwo

customer_reviews.title: I'm so glad I decided on these
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old son plays hockey, so I ended up buying these skates so I can join him on the ice sometimes during practice. I'm so glad I decided on these. They are sturdy, and keep my feet warm, cozy, and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dolan

customer_reviews.title: As described. Nice comfortable skates
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had these for a few months now and she still loves them. She skated with them right away and they worked great, felt comfortable etc but we did have them sharpened a few weeks later and they’re even better. My daughter is a size 8.5 in shoes and bought size 9 skates.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa G

customer_reviews.title: ... three year old grand daughter well and provide very good support for learning figure skating
customer_reviews.text: These fit my three year old grand daughter well and provide very good support for learning figure skating....she's in a UFSA Learn to skate program. Part of the joy in learning this sport is having good quality skates and these were just what we were all looking for. Thank You!
customer_reviews.author: Kekg

customer_reviews.title: Stiff support but comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a 5 women’s for my daughter who wears 3-4 size youth. These are stiff skates- in a good way. The skates at the sporting store had ZERO ankle support. These provide very stable support but are reportedly comfortable. The blades seem nice also. The blades are not ore-sharpened.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase. Would recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Received my skates on time! I am excited to start using them. The blades did not come sharpened, so I plan on going to my local rink to have them sharpened. They appear to be good quality and the fleece is very warm. My next purchase will be blade covers because the ones that came with it are meant for shipping. Sizing was great! I wear a size 7 shoe and chose the size 7 skate. Even with thicker socks, they fit great. Now it's just time to break them in :)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I love these so far. Get them sharpened at the rink. Ankle stability is great. Only thing I would change is the laces. Buy some different ones because the ones on the boot are way too short. Great purchase!!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Allen

customer_reviews.title: the stiffness is a good thing. Her ankles stay straight all afternoon
customer_reviews.text: They are as described. Daughter found them stiff at first, but that would be expected for brand new skates. She used them and was able to skate really well by the end of the afternoon. They need to be broken in. In my opinion, the stiffness is a good thing. Her ankles stay straight all afternoon :-) I am pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth and Jean

customer_reviews.title: Great started skates!
customer_reviews.text: These are a pair of great starter skate I will definitely recommend them. I got these for my six-year-old daughter and she uses them every week for a skate classes nice and soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good skates
customer_reviews.text: comfortable and well built, the toe picks are the only disadvantage to those learning to first skate, they get in the way
customer_reviews.author: Dylan S.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of ice skates; my daughter loves wearing them. They are more comfortable and keep her feet warmer than the rental skates she was using - so glad I got her these! However, as some other reviewers had mentioned, the skates run small. My daughter has wide feet and wears a size 10 shoe, so I got ordered a size 12 skate which turned out too small and narrow. We ended up getting a size 1 skate, which was a little big but very comfortable with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: VG

customer_reviews.title: Can't imagine a more comfortable Skate.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a newbie taking classes with my 10 year old and got tired of renting skates. Bought these and skating has become even more pleasant. They fit super comfortable and give me great ankle support. Feel more confident skating!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Crawford & Family

customer_reviews.title: Hurts
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for a while but did not get chance to wear it until yesterday. It hurts my foot bone so much, very uncomfortable. Amazon give one month return policy only, unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Luo

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, pretty comfortable entry level skate.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Ok for the price. Not a 5 because the blade was incredibly dull, not even a hint of an edge when they arrived. I normally wear a 5 1/2 shoe. Fot comfortably even with thick socks.
customer_reviews.author: catherine deciechi

customer_reviews.title: great skates for my 5 year old daughter!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter who is taking figure skating classes once a week. the boot is very stiff at the ankle. She's only used them for a few classes but they seem very sturdy and of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Taught my daughter to skate in these.
customer_reviews.text: Work great for my daughter! I started her with hockey skates to teach her how to skate but she wasnt really getting it. But then switched her to these and the toe picks helped her understand how to skate better now she is 2.5 and cant skate by herself
customer_reviews.author: Tyler P.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and cute!
customer_reviews.text: I love these ice skates - they are very comfortable and have a perfect fit. The pink is just the right pop of color. It does seem like the laces are a bit short, but can usually get away without lacing them all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: my toddlers love these
customer_reviews.text: i had no idea what to buy but my toddler twins love these and they are in each girls favourite colours too!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree

customer_reviews.title: These seemed bad at first
customer_reviews.text: These seemed bad at first, but I had 'em sharpened and it is good now. Very comfortable boot and warm too. My first "recreational" pond skates, I wanted these for the comfort not found in pro skates. I like the fuzziness too.
customer_reviews.author: D. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: Great looking skates
customer_reviews.text: Great looking skates, cheap laces that will break quickly. Lost one star because the blades aren't sharp at all and you need to get them sharpened. Comfort wise, they are cushioned well and warm. Looks super cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Shoppin Mom

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my 9 years old girl. She loves ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 9 years old girl. She loves them. Very comfy. Usually we buy shoes size 3, skates got size 4 and they feet perfectly. Extra room, but it's ok, bc she wears two pairs of socks.
customer_reviews.author: natalia kouznetsova

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Love these skates! They weren't too difficult to wear in and the skates itself were comfortable and soft on the inside. A lot of people were saying that the laces were too short but I however did not have this problem. Would definitely recommend this skate to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Lady.Frizz

customer_reviews.title: Beginner Figure Skates
customer_reviews.text: These figure skates are great for beginners, but after a month of use the blade broke of from the boot. These skates do not keep your feet warm on the ice for long periods of time and needed to have the blade sharpened every 20-30 hours of use. Need to be properly fitted by a specialist. When I bought my new skates had to go down a size.
customer_reviews.author: Christin Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting more comfort from these ice skates, for beginners it’s okay but if you want to learn how to ice skate better I would not recommend it, not good for tricks
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Cheap product
customer_reviews.text: These skates did Not hold up! They are worn by my 15 year old granddaughter maybe 25 to 30 times and are falling apart..not worth purchasing
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: GS 180 SoftSkate Womens Ice Skates were a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my wife for Christmas and she was so happy to get a new pair of skates! She loves them and is back on the frozen lake enjoying skating as she did as a child! Great product and would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Mark C.

customer_reviews.title: A fine product
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product. Yeah, it costs a little more, but you're getting a serious pair skates that will give your little one the comfort and stability she needs to get good start. Will she be the next gold medalist. Who knows, but at least she won't be turned off from the beginning because of lousy skates.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Post

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my daughter. They are her first skates after using rentals at the rink. They are a bit stiff and not as comfortable as the pricier skates but for the middle of the road skate they are great. We will buy another pair as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Get one size larger than the shoe you normally wear. Also, there are no half sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Greg G

customer_reviews.title: very warm and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My 3-year old looks amazing in them. not only they keep her feet warm but they definitely look super cute and professional on her! I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Slava Zaritsky

customer_reviews.title: I love how these skates came sharpened
customer_reviews.text: I love how these skates came sharpened. The fit could be slightly better though. They hurt a bit by the ankle, so I'm considering getting them heat molded at my rink. However, they were a fantastic buy and much more reasonable than the same skates at my local pro shop.
customer_reviews.author: boxlessjess

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: I brought this skate for my daughter and it was too small, I brought 11/2 up to her regular shoe size but too small, and I had to buy one right away with amazon prime, so I had to pay $17 for shopping on top of that sorry won t be buying again from the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent ankle support super comfortable very soft
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ankle support super comfortable very soft. But my only complaints are the laces are REALLY cheap and feel like if I pull them too hard then I'll rip them off. Better laces and I'd give them 5 stars. Also the lavender color isn't as vibrant as the picture says it is which was a little disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: sutton

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfy !
customer_reviews.text: Can’t believe I actually have a pair of these babies ! I love them !
customer_reviews.author: Ydania M.

customer_reviews.title: Great boot
customer_reviews.text: A bit too tight. I wear a 5.5M and based upon comments thought these would work. Well, they didn't. I do not wear thick socks with my skates. Great boot, though.
customer_reviews.author: PaulaRose

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect skates for beginners. Very comfortable. Ordered my shoe size (size 9) and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice for beginner skating.
customer_reviews.text: I started ice skating again and these skates are perfect. They are reasonably priced and do the job. I wear a size 6 1/2. I bought a 6 and plenty of room for my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Stephens

customer_reviews.title: They run true to size
customer_reviews.text: My 12-year-old daughter loves these ice skates! We took her to Colorado snow skiing for Spring Break and we ice skated while we were there and she was very quick to warm up to the skates. We purchased these skates for her to use for her upcoming ice skating lessons that will start soon.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's been using them for a little over a month now. She's a first time skater and these have offered very good support for her ankles. She wears the same size in these skates as she does in shoes.
customer_reviews.author: riittle

customer_reviews.title: They are comfortable for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. They are comfortable for her, they came sharpened but we still had the ice rink sharpen again.
customer_reviews.author: Archer33

customer_reviews.title: Hard to break
customer_reviews.text: Really hard to break in... Nice skates though my feet hurt a lot... It has been 3 weeks of skating... I hope in a month they will give in
customer_reviews.author: Juliette Fusiarska

customer_reviews.title: Very cute glad I made the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and warm. Purchased for out door skating and had no problems. Must be sharpened upon arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable! Size on the small side
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable! Size on the small side. My daughter wears 2 for her regular shoes, but 3 on this! Anyway, good buy and will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wenteng Shao

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are comparable to actual foot size.
customer_reviews.text: High quality skate with good stability, fit, and durability. These were purchased for my granddaughter. She is eleven years old and this was her fourth pair of Jackson skates. She has tried other brands but likes Jackson skates the best. She says they are the most comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Rollin Sieveke

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable skates, no breaking in needed.  Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, nice looking, sharp edges. Highly recommend, I am not a beginner, but not professional either, so don’t know a lot about different styles of skates, just know I really like these. I skate outside and they are very warm !!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie A.

customer_reviews.title: I think they are comfortable. But extremely tight around the ankles
customer_reviews.text: I think they are comfortable. But extremely tight around the ankles. They keep my feet warm while on the ice as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kat Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great beginner skates for the price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these skates for my daughter for a learn to skate course. They are fantastic. Fit is as advertised and the blades have a good edge to them. They are also quite comfortable and are easy to put on and take off. Overall, I am very satisfied with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Great product, good value
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived as ordered. They were a present for my daughter and she loves them. They did take a little to break in, but are working out well for her.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sue Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Toe pick is beginner friendly
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves these skates, we keep getting the next size as she grows.
customer_reviews.author: tnoskilz

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: These skates were perfect! My daughter was able to take them from the box to the Rink. The blade shop had them sharp within 10 minutes and she was off skating! The price the quality really a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: bev finney

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a present for myself to skate recreationally. Been using them 3-4 times a month for about a year and they're still in great shape!! Super comfy and warm, but also protect your feet well.
customer_reviews.author: Reegan Beck

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with these
customer_reviews.text: These fit my daughter perfectly. She is a very petite girl with narrow feet and the padding inside it great on her legs. I will definitely be getting these in the next size for her.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Leone

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Unique design makes it easy for me to spot my skates in a pile of skates. Fast delivery, too. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Albright

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So much more comfortable than rentals. Well worth it for skating while my daughter takes lessons.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Good value for beginners skates
customer_reviews.text: Granddaughter likes these skates it is her 2nd pair. Last years didn’t fit this year. However we did get them sharpened before she used them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great/stylish skates!
customer_reviews.text: this was a better skate than i thought! i usually wear a 6.5 shoe size and got this in a 6 which fits perfectly with regular socks. these skates also came in a little sharpened which i was so happy about!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Arrived on time and my granddaughter loves the way they fit her feet and ankles. She skates with confidence and is adjusting well.
customer_reviews.author: gmalone

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly, these are a gift for our granddaughter ...
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly, these are a gift for our granddaughter. I ordered them because Jackson has a wider toe than most skates that I have found. The boot is vinyl, which does not matter for a skater that is not jumping. I will reorder this Jackson skate until my grand daughter is doing a hop then will switch to their leather boot. The fur lining should keep her feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: MommaO

customer_reviews.title: ... pair of skates I've owned and these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.text: 2nd pair of skates I've owned and these are my favorite.
customer_reviews.author: annette

customer_reviews.title: so I knew how important a good skate is
customer_reviews.text: My grand baby is a little over 2 years old...and both her dad and aunt figure skated....so I knew how important a good skate is. These skates are very sturdy and great padding...letting my grand baby stand up straight with no ankles falling over....she was able to walk or I should say march to the skate rink all on her own with no wobbling. I felt very confident in my purchase! These skates are great for our little ones!!! Thank you for your product in toddler sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica W.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. This is her second pair as her feet have grown. She skates 2 x week and these skates are perfect
customer_reviews.author: Leah Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them I purchased one size larger than her current tennis shoes size they fit great and she has a little room to grow. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Daughter learns to skate and they seem comfortable. No complains
customer_reviews.text: Appropriate for a first pair of skates. Daughter learns to skate and they seem comfortable. No complains.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: sizing was correct
customer_reviews.text: I bought these skates for my granddaughters for Christmas. They were heading to VT after the holidays. Skates were the correct size by the measurement chart and the soft skate feature made them comfortable. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: joanne w patterson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect skates!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these for her birthday! She loves them! She said the fit is great (snug around her ankles) and she’s excited to show them off to her friends! Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: River Monroeville

customer_reviews.title: Great skates:)
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift for my pre teen.. she loves them! Fleece lined is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: J. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Buy One Size Larger
customer_reviews.text: These appear to be well made, but sizing chart was off and were too small for my daughters.
customer_reviews.author: MultipleMama

customer_reviews.title: good skates
customer_reviews.text: Not as comfortable as I hoped they'd be based on other reviews. But comfortable enough.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginner, competitive price.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for beginner 5yr old skater, taking group lessons for 2nd year. Skates are soft and padded around ankle yet have enough flexibility for bending knees and learning basics. Her foot stays warm inside the skate while on the ice (unlike her old pair). Jacksons tend to fit wider feet (versus reidell) which works well for us. Blades do need to be sharpened before using (as always).
customer_reviews.author: RisCracker

customer_reviews.title: Thick and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my niece for Christmas. I was super impressed with them! We took them out to the rink to try them out and they were great very thick and sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: and they are very comfortable for her
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates. The fit is true to size, and they are very comfortable for her. I took off a star because the laces are just too short - it is very hard to have enough left over to tie a bow.
customer_reviews.author: Athalea25

customer_reviews.title: had to purchase twice as there was material that would ...
customer_reviews.text: had to purchase twice as there was material that would jab into the foot which over time would cause blisters and other soreness.
customer_reviews.author: tr0n

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Theses skates are comfortable, fit as expected and loved them so much I ordered a pair for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Gliding on ice
customer_reviews.text: I purchases a pair for my grandchild and myself love them.
customer_reviews.author: Marquita

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! But do check sizes conversion in order to get correct fit.
customer_reviews.text: Love Jackson skates. I'm usually a size 10.5 - 11, following the size guidelines I bought a 10 and they fit perfectly. So happy with these.
customer_reviews.author: Comtessa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent skate for beginner
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them- they are true to form, size appropriately and comfortable for her to wear- no blisters or discomfort when she transitioned to breaking them in
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Hines

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves her new skates. We have had ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves her new skates. We have had them for two months and they have held up well for her weekly figure skating classes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Skates are great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: The skates are great my daughter tells me. The laces are a little cheap, but the rest is great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: They are very poor quality. For anyone that ice skates on a ...
customer_reviews.text: They are very poor quality. For anyone that ice skates on a routine basis, the brand is fine but this particular one is not the one you want. Blades are not metal, ended up throwing them away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good skates for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My daughter received these for beginner level figure skating. They have great ankle support and keep her feet warm the entire time she is on the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya J

product_meta.title: Jackson Ultima GS180 SoftSkate Womens Ice Skates / Blue, Fleece, Pink, Purple
product_meta.description: Vinyl outer. Fully lined upper and tongue with cushy foam padding for maximum comfort.
feature_bullets: Nylex lining for warmth, comfort and durability
Charcoal PVC outsole for easy care
Made on a Jackson leisure last
See second image for sizing chart
